name: Maoergou Coal Mine
company_mentions: 山西煤炭运销集团猫儿沟煤业有限公司 (Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group Maoergou Coal Industry Co., Ltd.)

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. The Maoergou Coal Mine is an open-pit coal mine located in Shanxi Province, specifically in Hequ County

operators: 山西煤炭运销集团猫儿沟煤业有限公司 (Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group Maoergou Coal Industry Co., Ltd.)
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group and owned by Jinneng Group.
